Emerging growth company &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the Registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section 13(a) of the Exchange Act. &#9744; &#160; Item 2.02&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Results of Operations and Financial Condition. On April&#160;30, 2020 , Apple&#160;Inc. (&#8220;Apple&#8221;) issued a press release regarding Apple&#8217;s financial results for its second fiscal quarter ended March&#160;28, 2020 . A copy of Apple&#8217;s press release is attached hereto as Exhibit&#160;99.1.
